goal: My colleague's flight, FlyUnified FU789 from Chicago (ORD) to San Diego (SAN), is scheduled for the 10th of next month. Can you find its scheduled arrival time and then create an event on my calendar to 'Leave for airport to pick up Maya' that is set for 90 minutes before the flight's arrival?

evals.description: Verify the title of the created calendar event.
